docs.text: Proto Compiler Installation Find the latest release of protobuf compiler here Based on the choose of the language, download the .zip file Extract the contents of the file Execute the below commands $ cd protobuf- version_no $ ./configure $ make $ make check $ sudo make install $ which protoc $ protoc --version
docs.title: Setup

docs.text: Find the latest release of protobuf compiler here Based on the choose of the language, download the .zip file Extract the contents of the file Execute the below commands $ cd protobuf- version_no $ ./configure $ make $ make check $ sudo make install $ which protoc $ protoc --version
docs.title: Proto Compiler Installation
